listIdentityQuestions.question: 1. Have you or someone in your household tested positive for COVID-19?
2. Do you have any of the following new or worsening symptoms or signs like Fever or Chills?
Difficulty breathing or shortness of breath?
Runny nose/stuffy nose or nasal congestion?
Decrease or loss of smell or taste?
Not feeling well, extreme tiredness, sore muscles?
3. Have you travelled outside of Canada in the past 14 days?
4. Have you been in direct contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19 in the past 14 days?
5. Have you or someone in your household been directed by a health care provider, including a public health professional, to isolate?
